divs: sighting detailsi saw a light in the westernsky that i thought was a plane. i had seen a plane fly through the cloud cover two nights earlier and that was a great image as the landing lights lit up the clouds around the plane. i thought this wouldbe the same until the lights just stopped. it was an orang\red glow with some bright spots. no regular running or strobe lights. i watched it for about 30 seconds, then tried to get a picture,with no luck. i watched it for about another 30 seconds,just hovering in place,no noise. it's glow faded and i could make out pulsing red\yellow lights.then it suddenly shot straight up, moving through the cloud cover,which glowed with it's passing.
Summary: I thought it was a plane until it stopped and hovered.
